title: How do i get rid of league of legends?
body: This game has become too draining on my life and im interested in deleting the account, I would opt to go this route but I'm not waiting 15 days. As an alternative, what would be the best way to get this account perma banned so i cant access it anymore? This game is way too distracting and addicting, it has to go. What if i posted it for sale? would that get it perma banned? Would be faster than waiting a ridiculous 15 days, the outcome is the same anyway.

replies.body: I can certainly understand wanting to take a break and focus on other things, and it's totally fine to just leave the as it is.  You can come back whenever you want, and your account would remain in the same state.  If you feel it absolutely necessary, you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into your specific request.  We'll get back to you through there.
